basics.name: Hugo Agbonon
basics.label: Freelance Full Stack Web (JS) Developer
basics.summary: I'm a freelance web developer specialized in JavaScript full-stack (both front-end and back-end) development.

work.summary: Development of a website used to help job-seekrs relocate
highlights: Front-end JS (React, ES2015+, Redux, Babel, Webpack, Jest, Storybook...)
Back-end (node.js / nginx / PostGreSQL)

work.summary: Full redevelopment of the web interface used by the in-browser extension of Dashlane’s password manager
highlights: Front-end JS (React, ES2015+, Redux, Babel, Webpack,  Storybook, Cypress...)

work.summary: Development of an alternative (and better!) way to declare your situation as a job-seeker for the French national work agency
highlights: Front-end JS (React, ES2015+, Redux, Babel, Webpack, Jest, Storybook...)
Back-end (node.js / nginx / PostGreSQL)

work.summary: Work on Agilience.com and B2B products
highlights: Development of a social analytics webapp
Front-end JS (React, ES2015+, Redux, Babel, Webpack)
Developed "Le Huit", a high quality CMS for journalists, part of a team of 10
Front-end, Back-end JS
Technical lead of the MyTF1 Connect Project: Management of data for the companion app to live TV
Started the development of the WISDOM project, for ads management in replay TV
Work on TF1.fr (website of the first french television)

Development of an system to archive and analyze detailed logs for an application which created millions of log lines per hour.

Development of a video-sharing website (like YouTube, but with different objectives specific to the company), developed with PHP/MySQL (Zend Framework)
Preparation of a virtual machine (VirtualBox) as main work environment for the developers of the project.
Participation to the fusion with another video-sharing website which was developed in another department of the company.
Developed a system to manage standardized reports created by doctors to centralize their data and allow its printed output.
Technical support for the employees of the hospital
